alert.note: Alert for Pulaski (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued January 11 at 10:59PM CST until January 11 at 11:15PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 PM CST FOR NORTHEASTERN PERRY...SOUTH CENTRAL CONWAY...SOUTHWESTERN FAULKNER AND NORTHWESTERN PULASKI COUNTIES... At 1059 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Mayflower, or near Conway, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Conway... Mayflower... Houston... Little Italy... Toad Suck... Wye Mountain... Bigelow... Fourche... Antioch in Perry County... Oak Grove in Perry County... New Dixie... Pleasant Valley in Perry County... Wye... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CST for central Arkansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
